text:
Hello,

I would like to use the new chainsaw V2 to see logging.
I am not always be able to access internet and I would like to use the chainsaw.
But when I start it I search fot update and then the launching is abort because
of timeout connection.

I have check in the jnlp AMchainsaw file and the offline-allowed tag is present.

Can you help me?
creator: Pierre.Richelle@gmail.com
psmith@apache.org
text:
Try this, there is an offline build for you to use (although the Offline mode
should still work)

http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/webstart/chainsaw/chainsaw-bundle.zip

When I create a Webstart distro, I also create this offline distro.

Let us know if this works for you by closing this issue, I'll mark it as fixed.
